title: The Party
creator_credit: Paul Sutherland, McGraw-Hill Films and Riverbank Productions
brief_description: Hammy and Roddy give a party in their home - the well furnished and comfortable interior of an old shoe. After dinner and games the guests leave, Hammy and Roddy relax beofre a fire. Roddy, hearing a srange sound, rushes outside to find Guinea Pig in his flying balloon caught in a tree. They rescue him with a ladder, and a grateful Guinea Pig settles down to enjoy his friends’ hospitality.
